definition.name: Collapsible
definition.purpose: Provides a collapsible container for showing and hiding content.
definition.description: A reusable UI component that wraps Radix UI's Collapsible.Root, allowing content to be expanded or collapsed. Accepts all props supported by Radix's Collapsible.Root.

initial.data: Collapsed or expanded state as determined by props.

when.description: The user interacts with the trigger or a controlled prop changes.

effects: Content is shown or hidden based on the expanded/collapsed state.

definition.visualLayout: A container that can expand or collapse its children.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's Collapsible.Root. Passes all props through.

definition.name: CollapsibleTrigger
definition.purpose: Provides a trigger element to toggle the collapsible state.
definition.description: A reusable UI component that wraps Radix UI's CollapsibleTrigger, used to toggle the expanded/collapsed state of a Collapsible. Accepts all props supported by Radix's CollapsibleTrigger.

initial.data: Trigger is rendered and ready for user interaction.

when.description: The user clicks or interacts with the trigger.

definition.visualLayout: A button or interactive element to toggle collapsible content.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's CollapsibleTrigger. Passes all props through.

definition.name: CollapsibleContent
definition.purpose: Displays the content that is shown or hidden by the collapsible state.
definition.description: A reusable UI component that wraps Radix UI's CollapsibleContent, rendering the content that is conditionally shown or hidden based on the collapsible state. Accepts all props supported by Radix's CollapsibleContent.

initial.data: Content is hidden or shown based on the collapsible state.

visible: Collapsible content element with updated visibility

definition.visualLayout: A container for content that is conditionally rendered.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI's CollapsibleContent. Passes all props through.
